title: 12: Do Not Let the Lykae into the Yankee Candle Store: MacRieve
dc:creator: Jennifer Prokop
description: MacRieve is here and so is friend of the pod, Sierra Simone! We’re so excited to talk about The Full Kresley, what makes erotic romance, The Simone Scale™ of taboo romance, why MacRieve is so tough to read, why Sarah thinks it might be Kresley’s best book, and why Chloe is such a badass. There’s a lot of hysterical laughter, and Sarah is preparing for legal action.
itunes:author: Fated Mates
itunes:subtitle: Sierra Simone joins Sarah and Jen to talk MacRieve!
